choices.text: Spring an ambush with {{companion}}

raiders.title: Skysteel Raiders
raiders.text: Raiders descend on storm wings, testing your convictions.

choices.text: Drive them back with turbine thrust

gale.title: Ember Gale Crossing
gale.text: Flames dance across the road, daring you to abandon {{motivation}}.
gale.log: You guide the caravan through the gale.

choices.text: Shield civilians with armored carriages
Use storm turbines to carve a safe corridor

ambush.title: Decoy Ambush
ambush.text: Your trap springs, scattering raiders and freeing captives.
ambush.log: You turn the tables on the raiders.

choices.text: Assign scouts to watch the supply line

finale_relay.title: Coalition Relay
finale_relay.text: Linked settlements share resources, each pledged to uphold your {{focus_trait}} vision.
finale_relay.log: A coalition relay strengthens the frontier.

finale_arrival.title: Triumphant Arrival
finale_arrival.text: Supplies pour into Emberfall as grateful citizens cheer your {{tone}} heroism.

finale_drive.title: Storm-Driven Vanguard
finale_drive.text: Harnessed winds push the caravan ahead of every threat.
finale_drive.log: You lead the vanguard through the storm.

finale_guard.title: Ashguard Bulwark
finale_guard.text: Armored wagons form a shield wall, earning trust from every traveler under your care.

finale_watch.title: Skywatch Scouts
finale_watch.text: Rescued scouts patrol the routes, ensuring relief continues for generations.
finale_watch.log: Your scouts guard the supply lines.

meta.title: Chronicle of the Sky Loom
meta.subtitle: An epic {{tone}} {{genre}} odyssey weaving {{focus_trait}} into the fate of the skies.

start.title: Summit of Beginnings
start.text: At the summit observatory, constellations realign, heralding a threat to the aerial realms.
start.flavor: Only one guided by {{motivation}} and {{playstyle_trait}} can respond in time.
start.log: You witness omens in the skies.

choices.text: Consult the star archivists
Rally the skyship captains
Descend to the world below for allies

archives.title: Star Archives
archives.text: Ancient charts reveal fractures spreading across ley-lines.
archives.log: You glean knowledge from the archives.

choices.text: Decode the sky loom pattern
Seek the archivist council's blessing

skyship.title: Deck of the Stormrider
skyship.text: Captains await your command to secure the skies for {{motivation}}.
skyship.log: You take command of the skyships.

choices.text: Chart a course to the tempest border
Patrol for looming threats

worldroot.title: Worldroot Assembly
worldroot.text: Below the clouds, druids and artificers debate how {{focus_trait}} can restore balance.

choices.text: Forge an alliance with the earthbound
Return to the summit with reinforcements

pattern.title: Sky Loom Pattern
pattern.text: Mathematical constellations predict a collapse unless threads are rewoven.
pattern.log: You decode the sky loom's warnings.

choices.text: Project the pattern to the captains
Synchronize with {{companion}}'s intuition

council.title: Archivist Council
council.text: Archivists lend artifacts tuned to {{tone}} destinies.

choices.text: Empower the sky loom compass
Share the prism with allied captains

tempest.title: Tempest Border
tempest.text: Living storms swirl with messages about impending collapse.

choices.text: Harness the storm into a ward
Follow lightning trails to hidden bastions

patrol.title: Sky Patrol
patrol.text: Patrols intercept raiders seeking to exploit the chaos.

choices.text: Deliver the charts to the archives
Use the charts to plan a counterstrike

alliance.title: Earthbound Alliance
alliance.text: The worldroot coalition pledges aid if {{focus_trait}} guides your choices.

choices.text: Unite them with the sky captains
Channel their strength into the loom

summit_return.title: Return to the Summit
summit_return.text: Allies gather, awaiting the weaving of destiny.

choices.text: Prepare the sky loom station
Deploy to the storm front

companion_sync.title: Shared Resonance
companion_sync.text: You and {{companion}} synchronize visions, blending logic and intuition.
companion_sync.log: Your bond deepens through the loom.

choices.text: Translate the vision into a flight plan
Imprint the resonance on the loom

loom_station.title: Sky Loom Station
loom_station.text: The loom awaits threads from allies, artifacts, and your {{motivation}}.
loom_station.log: You approach the sky loom core.

choices.text: Weave the loom with harmonic prisms
Integrate the worldroot pact
Deploy the alliance standard
Thread the loom using the diagram
Channel the storm ward
Focus on your bond with {{companion}}
Call for aid from the sky captains
Open the loom to future wanderers

stormward.title: Storm Ward
stormward.text: You tame the tempest into a shield of crackling light.

choices.text: Bring the ward to the loom

hidden_bastion.title: Hidden Bastion
hidden_bastion.text: A fortress in the clouds holds prisoners vital to {{motivation}}.

choices.text: Send the navigators to aid the loom
Escort them to the skyship fleet

counterstrike.title: Precision Counterstrike
counterstrike.text: You strike at raider strongholds, ensuring safe skies.

choices.text: Devote the momentum to the loom

loom_prism.title: Prismatic Weave
loom_prism.text: Prismatic light amplifies {{focus_trait}}, stabilizing the loom's resonance.

loom_worldroot.title: Worldroot Threads
loom_worldroot.text: Earthbound energy anchors the loom, honoring {{motivation}}.

loom_alliance.title: Alliance Weave
loom_alliance.text: United banners form new constellations reflecting {{focus_trait}}.
loom_alliance.log: Allies leave their mark on the loom.

loom_diagram.title: Diagrammatic Symphony
loom_diagram.text: Mathematics guides each thread, blending {{playstyle_trait}} with precision.
loom_diagram.log: The loom responds to your calculations.

loom_storm.title: Storm Threading
loom_storm.text: Storm energy crackles through the loom, fortifying the skies.

loom_companion.title: Bonded Thread
loom_companion.text: {{companion}} adds heart to the weave, ensuring {{motivation}} serves all.

loom_captains.title: Captain's Accord
loom_captains.text: Sky captains pledge ongoing patrols to protect the loom.

loom_future.title: Future Horizons
loom_future.text: You leave parts of the loom unwoven, inviting future adventurers guided by {{playstyle_trait}}.
loom_future.log: You open the loom to new legends.

meta.title: Requiem of the Astral Choir
meta.subtitle: An epic {{tone}} {{genre}} crusade harmonizing realms for {{motivation}}.

start.title: Celestial Convergence
start.text: Planets align above the Astral Choir, threatening to tear songlines that bind the realms.
start.flavor: {{companion}} steadies the harmonic focus while your {{signature}} thrums with cosmic chords.
start.log: You stand before the Astral Choir.

choices.text: Consult the harmonic sages
Rally the interplanar fleets
Descend to mend broken songlines

sages.title: Harmonic Sages
sages.text: Sages reveal that discordant echoes originate from realms that abandoned {{focus_trait}}.

choices.text: Compose a counter-melody
Seek forgotten verses in the archive strata

counter.title: Counter-Melody
counter.text: Your melody stabilizes the choir, but requires champions to sustain it.

choices.text: Teach the melody to allied realms

verses.title: Archive Strata
verses.text: Buried verses recount heroes who fused technology with myth to defend {{motivation}}.

choices.text: Empower the choir with ancient harmonics

fleets.title: Interplanar Fleet Council
fleets.text: Captains of starborne galleons await your orders to safeguard the cosmic crossroads.

choices.text: Launch a preemptive strike on discordant nexuses
Escort refugees between singing worlds

strike.title: Discordant Nexus Strike
strike.text: Your fleets silence the nexus cannons that shattered harmony.

choices.text: Bind the shards into the astral loom

refuge.title: Sung Refuge
refuge.text: Fleets ferry entire choirs to safety, granting you loyal voices across the stars.

choices.text: Unite the choirs in a single anthem

songlines.title: Broken Songlines
songlines.text: Fractured ley-lines lash out where realms collided in ancient wars.
songlines.log: You descend to mend the songlines.

choices.text: Heal the wounds with astral flora
Anchor the lines with chromatic pylons

flora.title: Astral Flora
flora.text: You seed the void with luminous blossoms that resonate with {{playstyle_trait}} grace.
flora.log: Astral flora bloom under your care.

choices.text: Plant the seeds within the choir sanctum

pylons.title: Chromatic Pylons
pylons.text: Pylons root the songlines, channeling cosmic energy toward your cause.

choices.text: Bind the pylons to the astral loom

loom.title: Astral Loom Binding
loom.text: The loom hums as you weave shards and pylons into a unified defense.

choices.text: Stabilize the loom with the choir's anthem

finale_chorus.title: Unified Chorus
finale_chorus.text: Voices from a hundred worlds align, swearing to defend {{motivation}} with harmony and light.
finale_chorus.log: The astral chorus answers your call.

finale_resonance.title: Resonant Bastion
finale_resonance.text: The choir becomes a bulwark, merging technology and myth beneath your guidance.
finale_resonance.log: A resonant bastion safeguards the realms.

finale_bloom.title: Cosmic Bloom
finale_bloom.text: Astral gardens weave between worlds, inviting future heroes to follow your {{focus_trait}} example.

meta.title: Dominion of the Obsidian Bloom
meta.subtitle: An epic {{tone}} {{genre}} saga where devotion and intrigue sculpt {{motivation}}.

start.title: Midnight Coronation
start.text: The Obsidian Bloom unfurls only for rulers who can balance passion with justice.
start.flavor: Velvet-clad nobles watch as {{companion}} announces your {{tone}} intentions.

choices.text: Swear oaths with the heartbound knights
Negotiate with the veiled magistrates
Descend into the bloom catacombs

knights.title: Heartbound Knights
knights.text: Knights bind their blades to those who prove sincerity toward {{motivation}}.

choices.text: Invite the knights into a sacred pact
Train with them beneath the obsidian blooms

pact.title: Sacred Pact
pact.text: The knights offer their sigils, vowing to guard your reign and desires.

choices.text: Deploy the knights to patrol the realm

training.title: Obsidian Training Grounds
training.text: Shared drills kindle respect and whispered confessions of loyalty.

choices.text: Champion them in the tournament of dawn

tournament.title: Tournament of Dawn
tournament.text: Victories win you admirers eager to entwine their futures with yours.

choices.text: Dedicate the laurels to the realm

magistrates.title: Veiled Magistrates
magistrates.text: Magistrates test your resolve with labyrinthine contracts.

choices.text: Rewrite the covenant of inheritance
Broker amnesty for star-crossed lovers

covenant.title: Covenant of Inheritance
covenant.text: Your edits ensure leaders must champion {{focus_trait}} to sit upon the throne.

choices.text: Proclaim the covenant to assembled nobles

amnesty.title: Lovers' Amnesty
amnesty.text: Forbidden couples kneel, promising their loyalty in exchange for sanctuary.

choices.text: Host a revel to seal their devotion

revel.title: Devotion Revel
revel.text: Music and confession intertwine, weaving allies who would die for your vision.
revel.log: You preside over a revel of devotion.

choices.text: Bind the revelers to guard the bloom

catacombs.title: Obsidian Catacombs
catacombs.text: Beneath the palace, roots of the bloom drink memories from forgotten rulers.

choices.text: Commune with ancestral echoes
Harvest obsidian nectar

echoes.title: Ancestral Echoes
echoes.text: Phantoms reveal the sacrifices required to keep desire aligned with justice.

choices.text: Infuse the counsel into the bloom

nectar.title: Obsidian Nectar
nectar.text: The nectar heightens empathy, letting you sense the hearts of your court.

choices.text: Share the nectar during the coronation feast

feast.title: Coronation Feast
feast.text: Guests reveal their truths, binding themselves willingly to your {{motivation}}.

choices.text: Seal the vows beneath the bloom

finale_guard.title: Knightly Vigil
finale_guard.text: Heartbound knights patrol every border, their devotion echoing your own.

finale_dawn.title: Laurels of Dawn
finale_dawn.text: Victorious champions swear to defend both love and law under your guidance.

finale_covenant.title: Covenant Throne
finale_covenant.text: Nobles accept the new covenant, promising loyalty to {{focus_trait}} ideals.

finale_revel.title: Guardians of Devotion
finale_revel.text: Revelers become your eyes and ears, ensuring intrigues serve your {{motivation}}.

finale_bloom.title: Bloom Ascendant
finale_bloom.text: The Obsidian Bloom radiates balanced passion across the land.
finale_bloom.log: The bloom flourishes under your care.

finale_vows.title: Vows Eternal
finale_vows.text: Feast-goers swear everlasting fealty, intertwining affection with duty.
